Text: I may have connection problems for a couple of days due to work on the phone lines in my area but I will be back seeding ASAP if anything happens. apologies in advance if it does.

firstly, i would like to thank you for a great series of uploads with yj here. one thing that bothers me about them is episode 14 revelation. in the episode, once i hit the 15 minute mark thereabouts, the picture freezes and the audio goes on. if i skip that interval, the video resumes and everything's in sync. is there anyway you can fix this? or get in contact with the people who made these fix it? again, thank you for your contribution.
Agreed.  Thank you for all your uploads.  Awesome job.
what is the source for these webdls? the quality is like that of bluray.
slybunda, the source is itunes (removed drm, and muxed to mkv)

the quality is awesome , just as expected , thx dude

I'm going to seed for a week

Way too big. PhoenixRG rips are 275mb's per episode with same quality. Unfortunately they are rather hard to find, while this trash is everywhere.

I wish USian cartoon lovers would learn proper encoding skills from animephiles already. 600 mb per episode of 720p ? Ridiculous.
@karnal 200mb at the same quality ? when played in default screen yes , but when stretched the 200mb file looks grainy , this one doesnt
